# <a name="action-confirmations"></a><span data-ttu-id="822f6-102">操作确认</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="822f6-102">Action confirmations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="822f6-103">如果您无意中移动或删除了 Outlook.com 中的邮件，可以撤消该操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="822f6-103">If you accidentally moved or deleted a message in Outlook.com, you can undo that action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="822f6-104">"撤消" 对话框将显示在屏幕底部约5秒处。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="822f6-104">The undo dialog appears at the bottom of the screen for about 5 seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="822f6-105">选择 "**撤消**" 取消移动或删除操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="822f6-105">Select **Undo** to cancel the move or delete action.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="822f6-106">您可以在 "[操作确认](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications)" 中关闭此功能（</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="822f6-106">You can switch off this feature in [Action confirmations](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="822f6-107">**"设置** > **" 查看所有 Outlook 设置** > **常规** > **通知**）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="822f6-107">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Notifications**).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="822f6-108">注意：一旦发送了邮件，就无法撤消该操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="822f6-108">Note: Once a message has been sent, you can't undo that action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="822f6-109">有关详细信息，请参阅[我想在 Outlook.com 中撤回邮件](https://support.office.com/article/c069ddde-5282-4085-8f4c-d7b133324f8a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="822f6-109">For more information, see [I want to recall a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c069ddde-5282-4085-8f4c-d7b133324f8a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
